title: What is the ball-shaped jellyfish that I see so often around here?  It\'s kind of purple-burgundy, and doesn\'t appear to have any long tentacles....in fact, I watched a guy pick one up and throw it back in the ocean.  When I google \'jellyfish\', there are zillions of types, but I can\'t find this one.  ??
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7769
